article_title: The Game Plan: Getting Serious About Buying a House
article_text:
Matt Filippini has worked at two technology startups since graduating from college, is an avid skier and wants to buy a house soon.

The 27-year-old works in business development at app developer Ibotta Inc. in Denver, where he makes $40,000 a year. He also has an equity stake in the company, so he stands to reap financial rewards if it gets sold or goes public.

Every month, he automatically transfers $800 from his checking...

twitter.description: This 20-something has a good job, no debt and money in the bank, but hasn't started saving for retirement. An adviser says he might want to put off the home purchase for now.
twitter.title: The Game Plan: Getting Serious About Buying a House

image.alt: This 20-something wants to buy a house. Should he?
